TDAT:     protected void writeS(String text, int from, int ile) {
        try {
            if (text != null) {
                _bao.write(text.getBytes("ISO-8859-1"), from, ile);
            }
        } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
            // TODO Auto-generated catch block
            e.printStackTrace();
        }

    }

COM:writes a portion of a given string in the ISO-8859-1 encoding to a data output stream
